name: Bubble Archer
description:
Bubble Archer is a really simple game , where you shoot arrows to pop the bubbles.

Avoid Bubbles, Shot and improve your highscore.

Every bubble has different effect on you.

Watch Out!

 Interaction with bubbles and lack of arrows will kill you!

I would be grateful for any feedback!

Bubble Archer is my first  published game. I made its questionable music and art.
